snippet: The Supreme Court must stay a Texas execution and stop the state from breaching the Constitution.
abstract: Editorial calls on the Supreme Court to stay the execution of Texas death-row inmate Marvin Wilson, who has an IQ of 61; argues that Texas is acting in defiance of a Supreme Court ruling that found mentally retarded individuals should be categorically excluded from capital punishment.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court must stay a Texas execution and stop the state from breaching the Constitution.

headline.seo: Mentally Retarded and on Death Row
headline.main: Mentally Retarded and on Death Row
headline.print_headline: Mentally Retarded and on Death Row
